note.p: Education: Bury; Norwich; Jesus College, Cambridge. BA (1795), MA (1798)

Career: Fellow and Tutor, Jesus College, Cambridge (1798-1811); ordained deacon (1795); ordained priest (1800); Curate of St Clement's Church, Cambridge; Vicar of Whittlesford, Cambridgeshire (1807-1821);Vicar of Elmstead, Essex (1810-1821)
Notes: Name disappeared from PL in 1823.
